alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 19 at 1:42AM MST until November 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility as low as one half to one quarter mile at times in freezing fog. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Central Highlands, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, and Eastern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Black ice conditions will also be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains
